urls.title: What Is the Government’s Coronavirus Strategy? - 99%
urls.description: As we wrote on March 15, although there are many variants, there are only four basic strategies for handling the coronavirus. The four generic strategies are: the laissez-faire strategy – let the virus take its course without interrupting normal economic activity in the hope of building herd immunity quickly and doing minimum damage to the […]
